title: Epigenetics
description: This course will introduce the basic concepts and mechanisms in epigenetics, covering topics ranging from stem cell reprogramming, organismal development, social behaviors, to human diseases.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: BIOL 2344 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOL 2354 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOL 3450 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOL 2800 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOL 3450 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
